title: tyAgarAjAya namastE
sahitya:
tyAgarAjAya namastE namastE (shrI) kAtyAyanI patE pashupatE simhAsanapatE


anupallavi

 vAgIshAdy-akhila dEva vandita pada pankajAya yOgIshvara mAnasa samyukta vadana vArijAya 
					(madhyamakAla)
bhOga mOkSa dAna vAma bhAgasthita shailajAya yOga guruguhAtmajAya tyAga dhvajAya ajAya


caraNam   mukundAdi pUjita sOmAskanda mUrtayE mucukundAdi bhaktajana manOratha 
sphUrtayE mukura bimba prati bimbita mukha sphUrttayE muni pakSi mrga 
kITAdi mUkti prada kIrttayE sakalAgama mantra tantra sArajnAnu raktayE 
akatAdi tri-rEkhAtmakAdhAra pravrttayE sakaLa niSkaLa svarUpa saccit 
sukha vyAptayE vikalpa bhEda yuktayE viTanka rUpa shaktayE
